about.title: About Zoila
about.description: Zoila has years of experience in professional cleaning services. She takes pride in providing thorough, reliable cleaning services and has built her reputation through attention to detail and customer satisfaction. Lucy's Cleaning is dedicated to making your home or office spotless and comfortable.

primary.title: Deep Cleaning
primary.description: Comprehensive deep cleaning service for your entire home, including detailed attention to all areas and surfaces.

primary.title: Regular Maintenance
primary.description: Weekly, bi-weekly, or monthly cleaning services to keep your home consistently clean and fresh.

primary.title: Move-in/Move-out Cleaning
primary.description: Thorough cleaning service for moving in or out, ensuring your space is spotless and ready.

secondary.title: Post-Construction Cleanup
secondary.description: Specialized cleaning after construction or renovation projects, removing dust, debris, and construction residue.

secondary.title: Office Cleaning
secondary.description: Professional commercial cleaning services for offices and workspaces to maintain a clean, productive environment.

secondary.title: Window Cleaning
secondary.description: Interior and exterior window cleaning for crystal-clear views and natural light.

additional.title: Carpet Cleaning
additional.description: Deep carpet cleaning and stain removal to restore the beauty and freshness of your carpets.

additional.title: Upholstery Cleaning
additional.description: Professional cleaning of sofas, chairs, and other upholstered furniture to keep them looking like new.

additional.title: Specialty Services

items.title: Deep Clean
items.description: Comprehensive deep cleaning service for entire homes

items.title: Kitchen Detail
items.description: Thorough kitchen cleaning including appliances and surfaces

items.text: Zoila did an amazing deep clean of our home before we moved in. She was thorough, professional, and the house looked absolutely spotless. I would recommend her to anyone. She is a find!

Zoila has been my cleaning professional since 2023, and I cannot recommend her highly enough. Her quality of work is consistently excellent, her pricing is very fair, and she's always flexible and accommodating with scheduling. She pays close attention to detail—from neatly folding blankets to ensuring all trash is removed—and is responsive and professional in all communication.

Very reliable and thorough. Zoila cleaned our home after our renovation and you can't even tell there was ever construction dust everywhere. She was punctual, courteous, and her work exceeded our expectations. Great work!
I've used Lucy's Cleaning for several services now and have been consistently impressed. Zoila is professional, fair with pricing, and always delivers quality work. Highly recommended!
Outstanding service from start to finish. The move-out cleaning was done with precision and care. Zoila is professional, reliable, and her work is top-notch. Will use again!
Zoila did a fantastic job with our office cleaning. She explained her process clearly and completed the work efficiently. Very satisfied with the quality and would recommend to others.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Get answers to common questions about our services

items.question: How soon will I hear back after requesting a quote?
items.answer: We respond to all quote requests within 1 business day, usually much sooner via WhatsApp.

items.question: Are estimates free?
items.answer: Yes, initial quotes are completely free and no-obligation. We'll assess your cleaning needs and provide an honest estimate.

items.question: What types of cleaning services do you offer?
items.answer: We specialize in deep cleaning, regular maintenance cleaning, move-in/move-out cleaning, post-construction cleanup, office cleaning, window cleaning, carpet cleaning, upholstery cleaning, and specialty cleaning services.

items.question: Do you bring your own cleaning supplies?
items.answer: Yes, we bring all necessary cleaning supplies and equipment. However, if you prefer specific eco-friendly products or have special requirements, we're happy to accommodate your preferences.

items.question: How often can I schedule regular maintenance cleaning?
items.answer: We offer flexible scheduling options including weekly, bi-weekly, or monthly cleaning services. We'll work with you to find the frequency that best fits your needs and budget.

items.question: Are your cleaning products safe for pets and children?
items.answer: Yes, we use safe, effective cleaning products. If you have specific concerns or preferences regarding cleaning products, please let us know and we'll accommodate your needs.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Ready to get your home or office cleaned? Reach out to us via WhatsApp and we'll get back to you with a free estimate.

footer.tagline: Making Your Home Sparkle, One Clean at a Time!
